views.markdown:
Version 1.4.7: - Uses new server for DRM. Version 1.4.6:
- Resolves a bug caused by a wrong compiled binary (not done by me).
- Minor Bug Fixes...

Version 1.4.5:
- Installs RocketBootstrap by default.
- Fixes a minor bug that occurred on a few devices during DRM Check.
Version 1.4.4:
- Fixes Broken DRM Server Issue...
- Patches and Fixes Two Important Security Bugs...
- Fixes Issues with Having Multiple Secure WiFi Networks.
- Redesign the way of how Secure WiFi Networks are displayed in the settings.

Thanks @va2ron1 for helping with the WiFi Issues and the settings...

Please follow me on Twitter for fast Q&A and what-to-do if problems occurs, everything necessary is there :)

- Fixes Broken DRM Server AGAIN!

- Fixes Another Touch ID Bug...
- Fixes the Battery Drain Issue!
- Choose Your Own Magic Digits!

- Major Security Improvements...
- Fixes Touch ID, a bug that disabled Touch ID when passcode was disabled using a secure WiFi Network.
- Fixes a bug that could result a lock out forever!
- Fixes Encryption Leaks...
- Fixes another bug that could lock you out!
Version 1.2.1-1:
- Added Support for 9.3 - 9.3.3 in the DEB Control File.
Version 1.2 - 1.2.1:
- Blank Screen Bug Fix!
- Another Blank Screen Bug Fix!
- Always Show Status Bar Time!
- More Than 1 Secure Network, which means that you can use multiple network as "Secure Networks" to bypass the passcode!
Version 1.1.3:
- Fixes False Piracy Alert!
- Improved Validity Check...
- Fixes all iOS 9 issues...
- Fixes a Safe Mode issue.
Version 1.1.1:
- Disable the passcode when you are connected to a secure specified WiFi Network! :)
- Validity Check Fix...
- Minor Fixes...

Version 1.0.5:
- More Security Fixes...
